<h1 align="center">
  Chess Portifolio
</h1>
<h2 align="center">
(IN PROGRESS YET)
</h2>

Web (ReactJS) project developed using [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/) and [Contentful CMS](https://www.contentful.com/).
This project was developed to expose contents created by National Master Chess Glaucio Cella.
You can follow its content through [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/MrBocalf/videos) and [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/glauciocella).

### :hammer_and_wrench: Installing
Now follow the bellow steps to run project on your machine:

**1.** Clone this repo using `git clone https://github.com/gabrielbarth/chess-portifolio`. <br />
**2.** Move to the appropriate directory: `cd chess-portifolio`.<br />
**3.** Run `yarn` to install dependencies.<br />
**4.** Now you need set the required informations on .env file (contact me if you want contribute about content management). <br />
**6.** Run `yarn start` to run the app on browser `http://localhost:8000/`.<br/>


## :bulb: :handshake: Contributing
Please feel free to contributing and submitting pull requests.
